channel.title: [317] Player=Player_ .Login [317]
channel.description:
317, help me with this O.o?
If you log in with a players name e.g "Player" and log back out, then log back on with "player_" the '_' being a space. It will log u in as a new profile with the name, but it wont show the space...
So there would be two people names "Player" .. And "player_"
Is there any way to make the player not be able to login with a space at the end of the name?

item.title: [317] Player=Player_ .Login [317]
item.dc:creator: @Blood_zeus Blood zeus
item.description:
@Blood_zeus wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:2, topic:335865”]if (playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith("_")) { disconnected = true; }

Maybe something like that in your initialize() void?[/quote]

Worked thanks m8…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Player=Player_ .Login [317]
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

if (playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith("_")) { disconnected = true; }

Maybe something like that in your initialize() void?

Read full topic
